message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.EC. 

The paper deals with the design of auctions and mechanisms for hiring a team of agents to perform a task, which falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT). The use of false-name-proof mechanisms and the analysis of their frugality ratio suggest a focus on algorithmic aspects, which could place the paper in the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) or data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The evaluation of the proposed mechanisms through simulation suggests a focus on machine learning or statistical methods, which could place the paper in the categories of machine learning (cs.LG) or economics and computation (cs.EC).
